parameters.urban:
Type of region of residence - a factor.  Levels are
urban and rural
parameters.use: Contraceptive use at time of survey
parameters.age:
Age of woman at time of survey (in years), centred around
mean.
parameters.district: Identifying code for each district - a factor
parameters.woman: Identifying code for each woman - a factor
parameters.livch:
Number of living children at time of survey - an
ordered factor.  Levels are 0, 1, 2, 3+

description:
Description
These data on the use of contraception by women in urban and rural
areas come from the 1988 Bangladesh Fertility Survey.
title: Contraceptive use in Bangladesh
format: A data frame with 1934 observations on the following 6 variables.
